'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Key}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Opens the door to the storage room in the [Deadlight Dungeon](/deadlightDungeon/), located directly north of the stairs down from the [Fort Deadlight](/fortDeadlight/) courtyard.
